alert.note: Alert for Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:02PM CDT until July 14 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Stafford County in south central Kansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 302 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hudson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stafford around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Zenith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
